entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 9. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain or snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the evening then changing to snow mixed with rain overnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 17 April 2023
